abstract: The producers behind an effort to finish “The Other Side of the Wind,” Welles’s incomplete final film, are exploring other options.
snippet: The producers behind an effort to finish “The Other Side of the Wind,” Welles’s incomplete final film, are exploring other options.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The producers behind an effort to finish “The Other Side of the Wind,” the incomplete final film of Orson Welles, are moving on to Plan C after coming up short on an Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign.

headline.main: Orson Welles’s Last Film Hits a Bump in Production, but Project Continues
headline.print_headline: Plan for Last Welles Film Hits Snag, but Carries On
